data: Tredgold and Son | High Street | Binchester
private office of Tredgold and Son | High Street of Binchester
Mr. Edward Tredgold sat in the private office of Tredgold and Son, land and estate agents, gazing through the prim wire blinds at the peaceful High Street of Binchester.
